title: Providing ChatGPT to the Entire U.S. Federal Workforce
raw_excerpt: Today, OpenAI for Government is announcing a new partnership with the U.S. General Services Administration (GSA) to launch a transformative initiative. For the next year, ChatGPT Enterprise will be available to the entire federal executive branch workforce at essentially no cost.
raw_body: Today, OpenAI for Government is announcing a new partnership with the U.S. General Services Administration (GSA) to launch a transformative initiative. For the next year, ChatGPT Enterprise will be available to the entire federal executive branch workforce at essentially no cost.
speedrun: OpenAI is providing ChatGPT Enterprise to the U.S. federal workforce for free for a year.
why_it_matters: Promotes the use of AI in government operations.

lenses.eli12: OpenAI is giving a special AI tool to government workers. This will help them do their jobs better.
lenses.pm: The initiative targets federal employees, aiming to improve efficiency. It differentiates by offering free access, but risks include potential misuse and data privacy concerns.
lenses.engineer: The method involves deploying ChatGPT Enterprise across federal systems. Data security and integration with existing workflows are key constraints to consider.
